div.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 4px; border-left: 1px solid transparent;
font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14pt; text-align: left;

span.style: font-size: 12.8px; letter-spacing: 0.3px; text-align: left; font-family: arial, sans-serif;

div.style: font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14pt; text-align: left;

span.style: font-size: 12.8px; letter-spacing: 0.3px; text-align: left; font-family: arial, sans-serif;

div.span: The Greenland Central School currently comprises grades K through 8 with an enrollment of 415 students. The school is organized around “houses” and teaching teams- grades K-2, 3-4, 5, 6, and 7-8, with each grade currently consisting of two or three class sections.

div.style: font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14pt; text-align: left;

span.br: Our faculty, along with their colleagues in our SAU, are committed to the practice of Professional Learning Communities (PLC) as we continue to define and align our curriculum to state standards, provide quality instruction and clear expectations, gather and utilize performance data, and support learners relevant to their level of achievement.

div.style: font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: medium; background: rgb(242, 242, 242); width: auto; padding: 0px;
color: rgb(34, 34, 34); width: auto; padding: 0px; font-size: 12.8px; font-family: arial, sans-serif; border-top: none;

span.br:
If your child will be 5 by September 30, 2020, please contact the main office
at 603-431-6723 to request a registration packet.
